choose.when:
select id, title, content, create_time, user_id, total_view, type, total_like from homesta
order by id DESC limit #{size} offset #{offset};

select id, title, content, create_time, user_id, total_view, type, total_like from homesta
order by total_view DESC limit #{size} offset #{offset};
choose.otherwise:
select id, title, content, create_time, user_id, total_view, type, total_like from homesta
order by total_like DESC limit #{size} offset #{offset};

mapper.update: update homesta set total_view = total_view + 1 where id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into homesta (title, content, create_time, user_id, type) values (#{title}, #{content}, now(), #{userId}, #{type});
mapper.update: update homesta set total_like = total_like + 1 where id = #{id};
update homesta set total_like = total_like - 1 where id = #{id};
